___name.description: The name of the widget or activity.

___templateSource.description: The location of the widget's HTML template.

___styleSource.description: The location of the widget's stylesheet.

___description.description: A short description of the purpose of this widget.

___integration.description: How this widget should be loaded by the LaxarJS runtime.

___type.description: Type of the artifact, e.g. widget or activity.

___technology.description: Underlying technology of the widget, which will be used to load the controller and template.

___assetUrls.description: A list of files to make available as URLs via the artifact provider API.

___assets.description: A list of files to make available as raw content via the artifact provider API.

___compatibility.description: Compatibility flags set for this widget

___assetsForTheme.description: A list of themed files to make available as raw content via the artifact provider API.

___controls.description: Each control as a path that can be resolved using the module system

___features.description: A JSON schema for the widget feature configuration.

___assetUrlsForTheme.description: A list of themed files to make available as URLs via the artifact provider API.
